docs.text: Emeeting A simple API application for managing your room meetings. Introduction # The main goal for this project is create a simple and open source application for managing your room meetings. More details how you can build your own application here on Quick Start Guide . About API documentation check API Docs .
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: The main goal for this project is create a simple and open source application for managing your room meetings. More details how you can build your own application here on Quick Start Guide . About API documentation check API Docs .
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: Emeeting has support to OpenAPI this way you can check the demo application running on heroku emeeting-demo and test the API on the fly, or build your own application using the Quick Start Guide .
docs.title: API Docs

docs.text: Install from scratch! # Firstly, install requirements down below: Docker Git Git clone # 1 git clone https://github.com/jairojair/emeeting.git Setup # 1 2 3 4 5 cd emeeting docker-compose build docker-compose run app make migrate docker-compose run app make tests Run # 1 docker-compose up Access: http://0.0.0.0:8000 for see the API documentation.
docs.title: Quickstart

docs.text: Firstly, install requirements down below: Docker Git
docs.title: Install from scratch!

docs.text: 1 2 3 4 5 cd emeeting docker-compose build docker-compose run app make migrate docker-compose run app make tests
docs.title: Setup

docs.text: 1 docker-compose up Access: http://0.0.0.0:8000 for see the API documentation.
docs.title: Run
